analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0x4f34adfff48ceb4af2f3b2253cdfdcc99c9053f4.sol:
	Contract GlobalFuneralCareSaleToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x4f34adfff48ceb4af2f3b2253cdfdcc99c9053f4.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0x4f34adfff48ceb4af2f3b2253cdfdcc99c9053f4.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
